get.description: Get the configuration information about the IdPs for the current customer

200.description: OK - Returns a simple object containing the configuration information for the current customer.

get.summary: Get the configuration information about the IdPs for the current customer

parameters.description: GUID of the SAML IdP
parameters.name: guid

204.description: The SAML IdP was successfully deleted

parameters.description: GUID of the SAML IdP
parameters.name: guid

parameters.description: format of response data
parameters.name: format

parameters.description: Option to expand rating_details
parameters.name: expand

parameters.description: Option to show all industries, portfolio independent
parameters.name: show_all

parameters.description: Option to add sub_industries for each industry
parameters.name: add_sub_industries

get.description: Lists sovereign country industries for countries in the customer portfolio

parameters.description: Filters country industries from selected countries. Expects 2 letter country codes, comma separated
parameters.name: countries

parameters.description: Filters country industries from selected industries. Expects industry sector names, comma separated
parameters.name: industries

parameters.description: If set to 'ratings' also retrieves the entity's rating history
parameters.name: expand

parameters.description: Ratings history period. Allowed values daily, weekly or monthly. Defaults to 'daily'
parameters.name: period

parameters.description: Ratings history start date.
parameters.name: start_date

parameters.description: Ratings history end date.
parameters.name: end_date

parameters.description: Sort the results. Allowed values 'guid', 'rating', 'country_name', 'industry_name'. Prefix with '-' to reverse direction
parameters.name: sort

get.description: Retrieve graph data for an industry

parameters.description: Slug value for the intended industry
parameters.name: slug

get.description: Retrieve statistics data for an industry

parameters.description: slug value for the intended industry
parameters.name: slug

get.description: Retrieve insights for a specific organization

parameters.description: GUID of the organization
parameters.name: company

parameters.description: ISO formatted date to start looking for insights
parameters.name: start

parameters.description: ISO formatted date to stop looking for insights
parameters.name: end

parameters.description: format of response data
parameters.name: format

parameters.description:
Filters RCEs so that the score delta is lower than the specified value.
When this parameter is not specified the results are filtered by score delta lower than -10.
parameters.name: score_delta_lt

parameters.description: Removes score delta filter for RCEs so that the api returns all insights within a given date range
parameters.name: ignore_score_delta

parameters.description: format of response data
parameters.name: format

data.description: group of organization GUIDs and optional interval dates for limiting the result

end.description: ISO formatted date to stop looking for insights

start.description: ISO formatted date to start looking for insights

get.description:
Retrieve the observation details for rating changes.
The results are limited to 100 entries at most, by default this limit is 10 see the relevant query parameter.

parameters.description: GUID of the organization
parameters.name: company

parameters.description: The date when changes happened in the format 'YYYY-mm-dd'
parameters.name: date

parameters.description: Limits the number of results. When omitted a default of 10 is used.
parameters.name: limit

200.description: The details for the observations matching the specified criteria

parameters.description:
Filter changes by specified companies.
A comma separated list of GUIDs.
parameters.name: company

parameters.description:
Filter changes by date greater or equal to specified date.
ISO formatted date.
parameters.name: date_gte

parameters.description:
Filter changes by date lower than the specified date.
ISO formatted date
parameters.name: date_lt

parameters.description: Filters changes so that the score delta is greater or equal to the specified value.
parameters.name: score_delta_gte

parameters.description: Filters RCEs so that the score delta is lower than the specified value.
parameters.name: score_delta_lt

parameters.description:
The offset in the results to start from.
When not specified a default of 0 is used.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description:
The maximum number of results returned.
When not specified a default of 100 is used.
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Get a list of slack integration instances

parameters.name: id

200.description: Details of the successfully updated instance

get.description: Get available assessment frameworks for IQ assessments
